1.desc: A new logon session was created.
1.name: Logon

2.decs: A logon session was terminated and no longer exists.
2.name: Logoff

3.desc: Special privileges assigned to new logon.
3.name: Privileged Logon

4.desc: Special groups have been assigned to a new logon.
4.name: Special Groups Logon

5.desc: A Kerberos authentication ticket (TGT) was requested.
5.name: Authentication Requested

6.desc: A Kerberos service ticket was requested.
6.name: Ticket Requested

description: Authentication Alert events report the detections and resolutions of authentication session malicious activity.
name: Authentication Alert
